abstract: On this week's podcast, The Times's executive editor Jill Abramson discusses her new book, "The Puppy Diaries"; Christopher Chabris discusses new books about the science of the human brain; Helen Schulman talks about her novel "This Beautiful Life," a selection of the Big City Book Club; and Jennifer Schuessler has best-seller news. Sam Tanenhaus is the host.
snippet: On this week's podcast, The Times's executive editor Jill Abramson discusses her new book, "The Puppy Diaries"; Christopher Chabris discusses new books about the science of the human brain; Helen Schulman talks about her novel "This Beautiful Life,"...
lead_paragraph: In Sunday's Book Review, Alexandra Styron reviews "The Puppy Diaries: Raising a Dog Named Scout," the new book from The Times's executive editor, Jill Abramson. The book, which began as a popular blog, examines the joys and trials of living with a rambunctious golden retriever puppy.

headline.main: Book Review Podcast: Jill Abramson's 'Puppy Diaries'
